verses.verse: For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and will <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> them in their own <S%H127>land:<s%> and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> with them, and they shall <S%H5596>join<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them to their <S%H4725>place:<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5157>possess<s%> them in the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>handmaids:<s%> and they shall take them <S%H7617>captives,<s%> whose <S%H7617>captives<s%> they were; and they shall <S%H7287>rule<s%> over their <S%H5065>oppressors.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall give you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from your <S%H6090>sorrow,<s%> and from your <S%H7267>fear,<s%> and from the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you were made to <S%H5647>serve,<s%>

That you shall <S%H5375>take<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4912>proverb<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> has the <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H7673>ceased!<s%> the <S%H4062>golden<s%> <S%H4062>city<s%> <S%H7673>ceased!<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and the <S%H7626>scepter<s%> of the <S%H4910>rulers.<s%>

He who <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H5678>wrath<s%> with a <S%H1115>continual<s%> <S%H5627><s%> <S%H4347>stroke,<s%> he that <S%H7287>ruled<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> in <S%H639>anger,<s%> is <S%H4783>persecuted,<s%> and <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H2820>hinders.<s%>
The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> is at <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and is <S%H8252>quiet:<s%> they <S%H6476>break<s%> forth into <S%H7440>singing.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> the <S%H1265>fir<s%> trees <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at you, and the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> saying, <S%H227>Since<s%> you are <S%H7901>laid<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3772>feller<s%> is <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> us.

<S%H7585>Hell<s%> from <S%H8478>beneath<s%> is <S%H7264>moved<s%> for you to <S%H7125>meet<s%> you at your <S%H935>coming:<s%> it <S%H5782>stirs<s%> up the <S%H7496>dead<s%> for you, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6260>chief<s%> ones of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> it has <S%H6965>raised<s%> up from their <S%H3678>thrones<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> they shall <S%H6030>speak<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to you, Are you <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2470>become<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> as we? are you <S%H4911>become<s%> <S%H4911>like<s%> to us?

Your <S%H1347>pomp<s%> is <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave,<s%> and the <S%H1998>noise<s%> of your <S%H5035>viols:<s%> the <S%H7415>worm<s%> is <S%H3331>spread<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> you, and the <S%H8438>worms<s%> <S%H4374>cover<s%> you.

How are you <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> O <S%H1966>Lucifer,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning!<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> are you <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> which did <S%H2522>weaken<s%> the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

For you have <S%H559>said<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> my <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H410>God:<s%> I will <S%H3427>sit<s%> also on the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> in the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H6828>north:<s%>
I will <S%H5927>ascend<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H1116>heights<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds;<s%> I will be <S%H1819>like<s%> the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High.<s%>
<S%H389>Yet<s%> you shall be <S%H3381>brought<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>hell,<s%> to the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

They that <S%H7200>see<s%> you shall narrowly <S%H7688>look<s%> on you, and <S%H995>consider<s%> you, saying, Is <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> that did <S%H7493>shake<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>

That <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> as a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2040>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof; that <S%H6605>opened<s%> not the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H615>prisoners?<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, <S%H7901>lie<s%> in <S%H3519>glory,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But you are <S%H7993>cast<s%> out of your <S%H6913>grave<s%> like an <S%H8581>abominable<s%> <S%H5342>branch,<s%> and as the <S%H3830>raiment<s%> of those that are <S%H2026>slain,<s%> <S%H2944>thrust<s%> <S%H2944>through<s%> with a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stones<s%> of the <S%H953>pit;<s%> as a <S%H6297>carcass<s%> <S%H947>trodden<s%> under feet.

You shall not be <S%H3161>joined<s%> with them in <S%H6900>burial,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> your <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H2026>slain<s%> your <S%H5971>people:<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H7121>renowned.<s%>

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> <S%H4293>slaughter<s%> for his <S%H1121>children<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> that they do not <S%H6965>rise,<s%> nor <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> nor <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

For I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7605>remnant,<s%> and <S%H5209>son,<s%> and <S%H5220>nephew,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> it a <S%H4180>possession<s%> for the <S%H7090>bittern,<s%> and <S%H98>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> and I will <S%H2894>sweep<s%> it with the <S%H4292>besom<s%> of <S%H8045>destruction,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> as I have <S%H1819>thought,<s%> <S%H3652>so<s%> shall it <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass; and as I have <S%H3289>purposed,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall it <S%H6965>stand:<s%>

That I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> in my <S%H776>land,<s%> and on my <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H947>tread<s%> him under <S%H947>foot:<s%> then shall his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> them, and his <S%H5448>burden<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H6098>purpose<s%> that is <S%H3289>purposed<s%> on the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> that is <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H3289>purposed,<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H6565>cancel<s%> it? and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out, and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> it <S%H7725>back?<s%>
In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%> was <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4853>burden.<s%>

<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> not you, <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6429>Palestina,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of him that <S%H5221>smote<s%> you is <S%H7665>broken:<s%> for out of the <S%H5175>serpent's<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H6848>cockatrice,<s%> and his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be a <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent.<s%>

And the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed,<s%> and the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> in <S%H983>safety:<s%> and I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> your <S%H8328>root<s%> with <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and he shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> your <S%H7611>remnant.<s%>

<S%H3213>Howl,<s%> O <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H2199>cry,<s%> O <S%H5892>city;<s%> you, <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6429>Palestina,<s%> are <S%H4127>dissolved:<s%> for there shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall be <S%H909>alone<s%> in his <S%H4151>appointed<s%> <S%H4151>times.<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> shall one then <S%H6030>answer<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation?<s%> That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3245>founded<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in it.
